data.actual_result: Nothing happens the video doesn't upload and the upload bar disappears, no pop up at all.
data.expected_result: There comes a pop up saying the video size it to big
data.short_description: Video uploads won't say it's over 8MB when you add text
data.steps_to_repro: -  try to upload a video that is over 8mb - Add text to the video - The video will be trying to upload with the not moving bar and when it's ready it goes away without saying anything
